segment.source: This information is provided under NDA on an extremely limited basis and is subject to change.
segment.target: This information is provided under NDA on an extremely limited basis and is subject to change.

segment.source: Some features listed here are at risk of not making the cutoff dates and may be delayed until a future release.
segment.target: Some features listed here are at risk of not making the cutoff dates and may be delayed until a future release.

segment.source: Other features are being tested in a pilot (flighting) to ensure they're customer-ready.
segment.target: Other features are being tested in a pilot (flighting) to ensure they're customer-ready.

segment.source: Please reach out to your Intune/PM buddy if you have any questions or concerns.
segment.target: Please reach out to your Intune/PM buddy if you have any questions or concerns.

segment.source: Check back for new What’s Coming updates.
segment.target: Check back for new What’s Coming updates.

segment.source: The following changes are under development for Intune:
segment.target: The following changes are under development for Intune:

segment.source: The Rights Management sharing app is supported for Android.
segment.target: The Rights Management sharing app is supported for Android.

segment.source: IT administrators can deploy mobile application management policies so end users can view images, AV, and PDF files more securely, whether or not IT uses Intune to manage the devices.
segment.target: IT administrators can deploy mobile application management policies so end users can view images, AV, and PDF files more securely, whether or not IT uses Intune to manage the devices.

segment.source: See What’s New in Microsoft Intune for details on recent developments.
segment.target: See What’s New in Microsoft Intune for details on recent developments.
